#summary Use Case 1
#labels Use-Case

*Use Case: * Signing Up

*Identifier: * UC1

*Description: * Models a new user signing up for an account

*Actors: * User
*Preconditions: * User has internet access and is able to navigate to the URL

*Stakeholders: * _User_: Wishes to easily register with the website. 
_Victorious Secret_: Efficiently store incoming user data

*Flow of Events:*   
  # User selects option to register from homepage
  # System presents empty fields for required information
  # User enters all required information into the fields
  # System verifies the requested information
  # User confirms the registration information

*Postconditions: * User now has an account in which they can login into
